name: Dungeons and Dice
description:
IMPORTANT

If you have an issue where an enemy spawns outside of the dungeon just restart the game. It's a bummer I can't submit a fixed version for the jam. But this should work!

Gameplay

   Survive a game of D&D as the protagonist. The dice decides your stats in between every round. Use your trusty axe to defend against various monsters

Controls
  • WASD to Move
  • Left click to Attack
